entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
